title: Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet
alternative_title: Boarding School Juliet, 寄宿学校のジュリエット
description: The story takes place at Grigio Academy Boarding School where students come from two rivaling countries known as the "Black Dogs" and "White Cats". Persia and Inuzaka are leaders of their respective dorms but they are secretly in love with each other. Now, they must keep their relationship a secret from other dorm mates while trying to avoid trouble.
